Interface Capable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Actor, Ally, AstrologerStaff, AxeOfGodrick, Barrack, Bug, Cage, CanisLupus, CapabilitySet, Cliff, Club, Crater, Crossbow, Crustacean, CurvedSword, Dagger, Dirt, Dog, Enemy, FingerReaderEnia, FlaskOfCrimsonTears, Floor, Floor, Floor, GiantCrab, GiantCrabPincer, GiantCrayfish, GiantCrayfishPincer, GiantDog, GiantDogHead, GodrickSoldier, GoldenFogDoor, GoldenPotion, GoldenRunes, GraftedDragon, Graveyard, GreatKnife, Grossmesser, Ground, GustOfWind, Hammer, HarmlessEnemy, HeavyCrossbow, HeavySkeletalSwordsman, Invader, Item, Katana, LockedDoor, LoneWolf, MartianItem, MerchantKale, NonPlayerCharacter, PileOfBones, Player, Player, Player, PuddleOfWater, Remembrance, RemembranceOfTheGrafted, Runes, Scimitar, SiteOfLostGrace, SkeletalBandit, Skeleton, SpawningGround, Staff, Stick, StormveilCastleInhabitant, SummoningGround, SummonSign, TheFirstStep, Trader, Tree, Uchigatana, Wall, Wall, WeaponItem
public interface Capable
An interface for representing a collection of any kind of enum. A practical alternative to type introspection and other problems.
